la_manager::CharTypeTable

la_manager::CharTypeTable Class Reference

class of char type table This class record the char type table for tokenizer to look up More...

Static Public Attributes

static const CharType DEFAULT_ALLOW = 0x00
 "xxxx 0000" use the lower 4 bit to encode default char type: char allow is to be indexed, e.g. 'A' and 'B' in "A#B"
static const CharType DEFAULT_DIVIDE = 0x01
 "xxxx 0001" delimiter character that should removed and divide the string. e.g. '#' in "A#B" if we set "#" to be "divide", and the result terms are "A", "B"
static const CharType DEFINED_ALLOW = 0x00
 "0000 xxxx" use the higher 4 bit to encode the regulator option type defined by user
static const CharType DEFINED_DIVIDE = 0x10
 "0001 xxxx"
static const CharType DEFINED_UNITE = 0x20
 "0010 xxxx" ignored character that should be removed but not divide the string, e.g. if we set "# to be "unite", the result term will be "AB"

Private Attributes

CharType charTypeTable [TWO_BYPE_MAX]
